teameleven.smartbells2.businesslayer

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • teameleven.smartbells2.businesslayer.SessionManager

  • public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the session of Login. Created by Brian McMahon on 28/10/2015. Code adapted from http://www.androidhive.info/2012/08/android-session-management-using-shared-preferences/
